resources.string: The rest of us can find happiness in misery. - Fall Out Boy
Never be ashamed of what you feel. You have the right to feel any emotion that you want. - Demi Lovato
Life\'s a climb. But the view is great. - Miley Cyrus
Here\'s to the crazy ones. The misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers. The round heads in square holesâ€¦ The ones who see things differently. - Nikki Six
Maybe we can find a place to feel good and we can treat people with kindness. - Harry Styles
We are a hurricane! Drop our anchors in a storm. - Panic! At The Disco
How many nights does it take to count the stars? That\'s the time it would take to fix my heart. - One Direction
I am not afraid to keep on living. I am not afraid to walk this world alone. - My Chemical Romance
You gotta speak up, you gotta shout out and know that right here right now you can be beautiful, wonderful, anything you wanna be. - Little Mix
My dreams are my wings, i\'m flying. - The Wanted
